title: Software Engineer
responsibility: Design and implement software applications using Java and Python.
job_description: We are looking for a talented software engineer to join our team and help us build the next generation of Facebook products.
educational_description: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or related field.

title: Data Analyst
responsibility: Analyze large sets of data to identify trends and patterns that will help inform business decisions.
job_description: We are seeking a data analyst to join our team and help us optimize our operations through data-driven decision-making.
educational_description: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, or related field.

title: Product Manager
responsibility: Develop and execute a product roadmap to meet business objectives and drive user engagement.
job_description: We are looking for a skilled product manager to join our team and help us bring innovative products to market.
educational_description: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Business, or related field.
